name: Psychological Advisor Chatbot
desc: An AI-based psychological advisor chatbot that provides basic mental health guidance and emotional support through conversational interaction.

name: Voice Assistant
desc: A simple voice assistant capable of performing tasks like searching information, opening applications, and responding to voice commands.

name: IFPRI Website Clone
desc: A responsive clone of the IFPRI website, built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing menus, sections, and content similar to the original site.

name: Snake Game
desc: Classic Snake game developed using JavaScript with keyboard controls, score tracking, and increasing difficulty.
